pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Testing for AUC Data // Performs statistical testing to compare predictive models based on multiple observations of the A' statistic (also known as Area Under the Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve, or AUC). Specifically, it implements a testing method based on the equivalence between the A' statistic and the Wilcoxon statistic. For more information, see Hanley and McNeil (1982) doi:10.1148/radiology.143.1.7063747.
